attributes.action: Stop teaching high school children utter nonsense and teach them life skills
attributes.additional_details:
We need to make a change together making our future generation ready for the real world and not stuffing our brains with useless facts and figures. The man who came up with standardised testing ,Frederick J Kelly, said “These tests are too crude to be used and should be abandoned”
Every child has different dreams yet the teachers teach the same things the same way?
Do you think this is how the education system should function? I hope you sign this petition to stand up for the future generation.
attributes.background: Secondary school students are being taught things that are unnecessary and not needed later in life. My personal experience: I sent an email to the head of year stating what the children were being taught was unacceptable some teachers agreed and most told me to go to the parliament so here I am.
